props.name: showBorder
props.description: Whether to show a border under this row.

props.name: keyText
props.description: Text to use for the row key. If content is provided in the `key-text` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: keyClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the key wrapper.
You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: valueText
props.description: Text to use for the row value. If content is provided in the `value-text` slot, this prop will be ignored.

props.name: valueClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the value wrapper.
You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

props.name: actionsClass
props.description:
Classes to add to the actions wrapper.
You can bind a string, an array or an object, as with normal [Vue class bindings](https://vuejs.org/guide/essentials/class-and-style.html#binding-html-classes).

slots.name: key-text
slots.description: The content of the row key. If content is provided in this slot, the `key-text` prop will be ignored.

slots.name: value
slots.description: The content of the row value. If content is provided in this slot, the `value-text` prop will be ignored.
